message.body: Russo when/what time is your flight home for thanksgiving?
I'm flying into laguardia. My flight leaves at 3:30 on Tuesday the 20th
Darnit. When do you come back to emory? I come back sunday around 9:30pm, if your flight is around da same time we could take a cab (to the airport from.nyc or back to emory)
I think I come back at like 1pm on Sunday :(
Bleh kk. Maybe our december flights will overlap
